name: Z-World
description:
Z-World is a Third Person Shooter game based on Wave mode that can be played in singleplayer/multiplayer.

FEATURED
-SinglePlayer

-MultyPlayer

-ZombieBoss

-ManyGun

-Different Maps (will be added/updated)

-Many Characters to choose (will be added/updated)

This game will always be updated And also please consider giving me a donation, whatever you give it means a lot to me, thank you

New Update V1.0.2

-New Zombies

-New BossZombie

-New Maps

-Fix some bugs
